opportunities.title: Hillock
opportunities.description: A playful, soft-turfed rise within the landscape that adds elevation, interest, and movement to the Greenspace.

opportunities.title: Hydration Station
opportunities.description: An accessible water-refill station that promotes sustainability and supports active outdoor learning and play.

opportunities.title: North Green Fence
opportunities.description: A key boundary feature that frames the Greenspace and enhances safety while maintaining a natural, open feel.

opportunities.title: West Green Fence
opportunities.description: A complementary fence line that secures the west side of the campus and contributes to the cohesive design of the Greenspace.

opportunities.title: Greening the Green Trees
opportunities.description: Seventeen individually recognized trees that will grow to define the character, shade, and ecological richness of the Greenspace.

opportunities.title: Concrete Benches
opportunities.description: Comfortable concrete seating providing durable and welcoming resting spots throughout the Greenspace.

opportunities.title: Lamp Posts
opportunities.description: Lighting elements that brighten pathways and promote safe use of the Greenspace during early mornings and evenings.

opportunities.title: Planting of the City Trees Along Property Line
opportunities.description: Three city-planted trees enhancing the perimeter of campus and contributing to long-term environmental sustainability.

opportunities.title: The Community Donor Wall — Tier A
opportunities.description: Recognize your connection to Greenwood on the Community Donor Wall. Customized mid-size plaques will honour any gifts between $5,000 and $9,999.

opportunities.title: The Community Donor Wall — Tier B
opportunities.description: Recognize your connection to Greenwood on the Community Donor Wall. Customized small plaques will honour any gifts between $2,000 and $9,999.
